name: KFC Adventures
description:
Controls: 

A - Rotation to the left

D - Rotation to the right

SPACE KEY - Boost 

ESC - Exit game

Information (fictional): 
Welcome to "KFC Adventures", a game in collaboration to promote KFC. In the game, you will control a chicken through a wonder of scenes. Explore the city's skylines of roads, cars, and buildings. Dash through the farm and encounter other animals. Once you hit the KFC bucket, you have successfully passed one out of 5 levels. Don't forget the catch though! Avoid hitting any of the obstacles or face a cruel death for your chicken. 

Creator's notes: 
Dear gamers, I hope you enjoy this satisfying and addicting yet frustrating rocket-styled game. I designed the game to be fun for all ages however some levels may require slightly more skill than the previous level. If you happen to find any bugs, please report them to me on discord. Best of luck!

Warning: 
This game can be extremely frustrating. The creator, myself, is not in charge of any destruction or actions that you may choose to do after playing "KFC Adventures."

Important:
Do not rotate the character while on the ground. Please proceed with at least one space click before any rotation is done. 

Creator's contacts:
